projects.name: TypeSpec Evolution
projects.summary: Evolving TypeSpec to support broader API description scenarios across Azure services.
impacts: Reduced API onboarding time from 4 weeks to 1 week for 12 partner teams
3 new Azure services adopted TypeSpec this quarter
risks: Dependency on partner team bandwidth for migration — need executive alignment
valueDelivered: TypeSpec-to-OpenAPI v3.1 converter shipped to Azure Storage team
New onboarding guide reduced partner ramp-up by 75%
helpNeeded: Executive support to prioritize partner team migration timelines

projects.name: Azure SDK AI Agent Integration
projects.summary: Adding first-class AI agent support to Azure SDK across all languages.
impacts: Early preview adopted by 5 internal teams building copilot experiences
risks: Python and .NET implementations diverging — need architectural alignment
Blocked on OpenAI API stabilization for streaming interfaces
valueDelivered: Agent framework preview SDK released for Python and .NET
Streaming response support shipped in JavaScript SDK
helpNeeded: Cross-org alignment meeting with Azure AI team on shared interfaces

projects.name: SDK Performance Improvements
projects.summary: Systematic performance improvements across .NET and Java SDKs for high-throughput scenarios.
impacts: P95 latency reduced by 30% in Azure Storage .NET SDK
Java SDK memory allocation cut by 40% in Event Hubs hot path
valueDelivered: New connection pooling shipped in .NET SDK — 2x throughput for Storage clients
Event Hubs Java SDK hot-path optimization released in v5.18

projects.name: Python SDK Async Overhaul
projects.summary: Modernizing the Python SDK async patterns to align with current Python best practices.
impacts: Customer satisfaction scores improved in early preview feedback
risks: Breaking changes require careful migration guidance for existing customers
valueDelivered: New async API surface released in preview for 3 partner teams
helpNeeded: Need PM support for customer migration communication plan

projects.name: AutoRest Deprecation
projects.summary: Gradual deprecation of AutoRest as services migrate to TypeSpec. Long-tail effort with external customer impact.
impacts: Pinned deprecation issue in AutoRest repo received first external customer inquiry
risks: Long-tail — deprecation won't complete when conversions finish

projects.name: Azure MCP
projects.summary: Azure MCP server providing AI agent tooling for Azure services. Fast-moving project with multiple releases per week.

projects.name: Azure SDK Skills
projects.summary: Copilot skills for Azure SDK, published to public skills repo and packaged as CLI plugin. Integrated with Azure MCP.

projects.name: GitHub Copilot for Azure
projects.summary: VS Code extension and CLI plugin for Azure-focused Copilot experiences. Source in ADO.

projects.name: Azure SDK Tools Agent
projects.summary: Internal chatbot/agent for Azure SDK team workflows and automation.

projects.name: API View Copilot
projects.summary: Copilot integration for API View tool, helping with API review and design feedback.

projects.name: Java vNext (Unbranded Core)
projects.summary: Moving unbranded core to GA and migrating Azure libraries on top. Removes problematic sync stack. Storage data plane is first target.
risks: Push-pull tension — Jonathan wants broad adoption but needs to sequence carefully

milestones.name: Storage data plane on unbranded core

projects.name: Engineering System (EngSys)
projects.summary: Cross-cutting engineering system supporting all Azure SDK teams. Quarterly visibility requested by multiple stakeholders.
